original_text: Then Joshua told the people to start marching round the city. A group of soldiers should march in front of the Lord's Covenant Box.
korean_text: 또 백성에게 이르되 나아가서 그 성을 돌되 무장한 자들이 여호와의 궤 앞에서 나아갈지니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: to start marching round the city
A group of soldiers should march
in front of the Lord's Covenant Box
